text: @RandPaul @NYGovCuomo @NYGovCuomo did what Trump couldn't, he succeeded. NYC has twice as many people as KY, over 8 million people live in 1 city. Cuomo's the most qualified governor to handle COVID19. Governors should call him for help. Republicans are kissing Trump's A$$ while people are dying.
